    • epsilonEqual

      public static Boolean epsilonEqual(float a, float b, float epsilon)
      Check equality of two floats with an epsilon value. Allows "close enough" equality checking.
      Parameters:
      a - float one
      b - float two
      epsilon - epsilon value
      Returns:
      True or False based on abs(a - b) less than or equal to epsilon

    • showErrorDialog

      public static void showErrorDialog(String text, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin skin)
      Displays an error dialog box on the specified stage.
      Parameters:
      text - the error message to write
      stage - the Stage to show the box on
      skin - Skin used to generate the dialog box
